result.execSummary:
The defendant Zarah S. Puariea was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid at the Clerk of Courts Office. $50.00 per month payment plan to begin on 3/1/16 and on the 1st of each month thereafter.

Must provide DNA sample and pay $200.00 DNA surcharge. This is to be paid at the Clerk of Courts Office- this is included in the $50.00 per month payment plan to begin on 3/1/16 and on the 1st of each month thereafter. Defendant to stop at the PCSD today to see if able to take sample.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Zarah S. Puariea

records.addlTxt: Defendant Zarah S. Puariea in court with attorney Mark Drew Biller.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 1123am Def plea of G to Ct 1. CT accepts plea, finds G, enters JOC.  CT- fine of $465.60: this includes $200 DNA cost & fine/cost of $265.60. SNA sample, Def to stop at SD today. PP of $50/mo beg 3/1/16 and 1st of em thereafter. 1129am adj.
Defendant's - Plea of Not Guilty & Defense Motions.  Filed by Atty Biller.

Not to possess or use drugs or drug paraphernalia.  Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.  Not to commit any new crimes.  Must appear at all future court appearances.  Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of this Court within 48 hours of any changes of address or telephone number.

Defendant Zarah S. Puariea in court with attorney Mark Drew Biller.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 3:32pm Def plea of NG. WST. bond cont. 3:35pm adj.  Final pre-trial scheduled for January 4, 2016 at 11:00 am.
